content: shown as green lines in the pattern this video will help you to set up the ladder back https //youtu be/7_5_-suxbsq from round 3 to 16 you have to insert beats knit with mc than pass the beat on the stitch you just knitted in round 45 decrease the ladder back sts with k2tog the ladder back st with the next knit st when you finished this round stop for working the heel flap heelflap the heel flap is worked back and forth in row with mc only take the cc to the end of the first row catch the floats every fourth stitch row 1 rs first setup row k35 turn row 2 ws sl1 *p1 k1* repeat from * to * to end turn row 3 rs sl1 *sl1 k1* repeat from * to * to end turn repeat row 2-3 at least 18 more times for a total of 19 repeats heelturn the heel turn begins on a ws row and uses mc only row 1 ws sl1 *p1 k1* repeat from * to * 9 times p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 *sl1 k1* repeat from * to * 3 times ssk k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 *p1 k1* repeat from * to * until 2 sts before gap p1 p2tog p1 turn row 4 rs sl1 *k1 sl1* repeat from * to * until 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn row 5 ws sl1 *k1 p1* repeat from * to * until 2 sts before gap k1 p2tog p1 turn row 6 rs sl 1 *sl1 k1* repeat from * to * until 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat row 3-6 until you have 22 sts at the heel turn last row sl 1 *sl1 k1* repeat from * to * until 1 st before gap ssk do not turn your work gussetsetup the gusset will be on the bottom of the foot markers on either side of the gusset will indicate the decrease columns in mc they will converge at a point with the pattern of chart b in between outside the gusset the pattern continues with round 46 on the instep will be the cherry blossom pattern and on the sole will be a little flower pattern using mc pick up and knit 19 sts 1 st for every 2 heel flap row plus 1 in the corner in the next round remember to knit this last st together with the first stitch of the instep to avoid a gap along one edge of the heel flap cc will wait there work row 46 of chart a as established over the next 37 instep sts on the sole follow the new part of the pattern with the small flowers and the sole setup instructions below hanami-socks © anna-lena trost 3 sole setup on the
